# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.SSE41 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SSE4.1 instructions. A value of true indicates that the processor supports SSE4.1.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: SSE41
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

public static IPropertyKey SSE41 { get; }
